item.title: Family Mission Statement
item.author: Rob Fuller
item.description: I love this so much I wanted to keep it around. I googled to see if this was posted somewhere in text form but I couldn’t find it. Traditionally I haven’t been a fan of daily mantras, but I’m thinking about talking to my kids about repeating this one. From @emmalinecs on Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@emmalinecs/video/6866994894930562310 For those who don’t want to click on a Tiktok link or use the service I’ll set the scene a bit.
